urgent.action: Audit desktop SERP snippets and meta descriptions immediately. Check for mobile-only structured data, missing desktop favicons, or broken desktop rendering.
urgent.reasoning: 379 desktop impressions with ZERO clicks (0% CTR) vs mobile's 3.3% CTR. Desktop traffic is being completely lost - likely a snippet/display issue.

urgent.action: Implement 301 redirect from http://www.konacoffeedonut.com/en to https version. Add canonical tags and submit URL removal request in GSC.
urgent.reasoning: HTTP version has 98 impressions (1% CTR) cannibalizing HTTPS version (14.3% CTR). Consolidating will boost overall CTR significantly.

urgent.action: Rewrite meta title/description for homepage. Add compelling CTA like 'Fresh Kona Coffee & Hot Donuts in Waikiki - Opening Feb 25!'
urgent.reasoning: Position 2 with 0 clicks means your snippet is being ignored. This is a high-intent local query - fixing the snippet could capture valuable traffic.

quickWins.action: Add 'donuts near me' variations to homepage H1/H2 headers and create a dedicated 'Fresh Donuts in Waikiki' landing page section
quickWins.reasoning: 28 impressions at position 9.8 - just outside page 1. Small optimization could push to top 5 and capture these searches.

quickWins.action: Update meta description to prominently feature '100% Kona Coffee' - this is a premium search term with buying intent
quickWins.reasoning: Position 3 with 0 clicks indicates weak snippet. 'Coffee Kona' searchers want authentic Kona coffee - highlight origin story.

quickWins.action: Add local business schema markup with 'donut shop' as business type. Ensure NAP consistency.
quickWins.reasoning: Position 7.5 with 4 impressions. Schema markup can provide rich snippets and boost rankings for local queries.

quickWins.keyword: coffee shops near me open now
quickWins.action: Add business hours structured data and 'Open Daily' messaging to meta description
quickWins.reasoning: Position 2 but 0 clicks. 'Open now' searchers need immediate reassurance about hours - surface this in snippets.

opportunities.action: Expand Japanese content beyond FAQ/menu. Create Japanese-language blog posts about Kona coffee culture, Waikiki attractions, and tourist tips.
opportunities.reasoning: Japan shows 6.9% CTR (3x higher than US). Japanese tourists are highly engaged - capitalize with targeted content for Waikiki visitors.

opportunities.action: The Korean about-kona-coffee page ranks position 2 with 17 impressions. Create more Korean content, especially menu and location pages.
opportunities.reasoning: Korean page already ranks well (position 2) but has 0 clicks - optimize snippets and expand Korean content for tourist traffic.

opportunities.action: Optimize /en/about-kona-coffee page with better keyword targeting and internal links from homepage
opportunities.reasoning: 21 impressions at position 15 with 0 clicks. Page has visibility but needs content optimization to rank better.

insights.observation: Mobile generates 100% of non-tablet clicks (5/6) despite having fewer impressions than desktop
insights.suggestion: Prioritize mobile UX and ensure mobile snippets are optimized. Consider mobile-first indexing audit.

insights.observation: Japanese traffic has 6.9% CTR vs 0.8% US CTR - Japan tourists are highly engaged
insights.suggestion: Create pre-opening buzz campaign targeting Japanese travel blogs and social media

insights.observation: Brand keywords 'kona coffee donut(s)' ranking #1 with strong CTR (33-36%)
insights.suggestion: Brand awareness is building pre-opening. Maintain position and prepare for increased volume post-launch.

insights.observation: Many 'near me' queries showing but with low/no clicks despite good positions
insights.suggestion: Update Google Business Profile, add more location signals, optimize for local pack appearance
